title: "Cyborg Art Gallery"
content:
Welcome to our Cyborg Art Gallery! ðŸ¤–

We are a platform dedicated to showcasing the most impressive and innovative cyborg-inspired artwork from around the world. Our collection includes paintings, illustrations, sculptures, and more, all of which feature stunning depictions of cyborgs with metallic bodies and glowing eyes.

Whether you're a fan of science fiction, technology, or simply appreciate the beauty of art, our gallery has something for everyone. Our mission is to inspire creativity and imagination, while also providing a space for artists to share their unique visions with the world.

Browse our collection today and discover the incredible world of cyborg art! ðŸ’«

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An illustration of a cyborg with a metallic body and glowing eyes"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
